tool_description: Distributes survey invitations via SMS with character optimization, delivery confirmation, and carrier-specific handling.

content_id.description: Content identifier from Survey Content Builder

phone_numbers.description: List of phone numbers in international format

sender_id.description: Sender ID or short code for SMS

message_template.description: Custom SMS message template with survey link placeholder

error_messages: Invalid content ID: Provided content_id does not exist or is not optimized for SMS.
Invalid phone numbers: Ensure all numbers are in valid international format (+country_code_number).
Message too long: SMS content exceeds carrier limits (160 characters for single SMS).
Sender ID invalid: sender_id must be 3-11 alphanumeric characters.
Recipient list too large: Maximum 1,000 recipients allowed per SMS campaign.
Template format error: message_template must include {survey_link} placeholder.
usage: Provide content_id and phone_numbers array. Optionally customize sender_id and message_template. The tool optimizes content for SMS length limits and handles delivery across different carriers.

campaign_id.description: Unique identifier for the SMS campaign

messages_queued.description: Number of SMS messages queued for delivery

total_segments.description: Total SMS segments required for all messages

delivery_status.description: Initial delivery status of the campaign
